entry.title: SNOWFALL WARNING , Kamouraska
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:14 PM EST Thursday 16 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Snow. Low minus 10.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Increasing cloudiness late this evening then snow. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind southwest 20 km/h becoming northeast 20 gusting to 40 early this evening. Low minus 10. Wind chill minus 8 this evening and minus 19 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Thursday 16 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: Snow. Temperature steady near minus 10.
entry.summary: Snow and local blowing snow ending in the afternoon then clearing. Amount 5 cm. Wind northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50. Temperature steady near minus 10. Wind chill minus 21 in the morning and minus 16 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Thursday 16 February 2023
